RegexHelp1: For more advanced users, you can use RegexMessageReplace to modify/filter the final message being sent.
RegexHelp2: Example (Filtering nth mob kill annoucements): { "^.+ has defeated the \d+th .+$": "" }
EndpointHelp1: Use commands to handle denying sending and receiving! Use 't!help admin' for more information
GameStatusHelp1: Sets the bots now playing status. Can be configured with variables
GameStatusHelp2: %playercount% = Number of current players on the server
GameStatusHelp3: %maxplayers% = Maximum number of players allowed, based on serverconfig.txt or command prompt entry
RetryHelp: Set NumberOfTimesToRetryConnectionAfterError to -1 to retry infinitely
FormatHelp1: You can insert any of these formatters to change how your message looks! (CASE SENSITIVE)
FormatHelp5: %bossname% = Name of boss being summoned (only for VanillaBossSpawned)
